definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: let go, let alone (NH id. unbind (hair), uncover; Ar. far9un be empty, vacant, unoccupied (c. faraga rei), Syr. min uncover; Targum [[פְּרַע]] = NH);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. consec. [[וּפָרַע]] Nu 5:18; sf. [[פְּרָעׂה]] (Ges:§ 7 b, c) Ex 32:25; Impf. 3 ms. [[יִפְרָָע]] Le 21:10, etc.; Imv. ms. sf. [[פְּרָעֵהוּ]] Pr 4:15; Inf. cstr. [[פְּרׂע]] Ju Jdg 5:2; Pt. act. [[פּוֹרֵעַ]] Pr 13:18, Pr 15:32 ; pass. [[פָּרוּעַ]] Le 13:45, [[פָּרֻעַ]] Ez Eze 32:25; —

let go, let loose, people, i.e. remove restraint from them, Ex 32:25, Ex 32:25 (E); cf. Job 15:4 Che:JQ, July 1897, 577 ([[תִּפְרָע]] for [[תִּגְרַע]]); unbind head (by removing turban, sign of mourning) Le 10:6, Le 21:10 (forbidden to priests); also;Le 13:45 (leper), Nu 5:18 (womsn; all c. [[ראׁשׁ]]; v. Now:Arch.ii. 114; > denom. from [[פֶּרַע]] Gerber 18 al.).
let alone = avoid Pr 4:15; = neglect Pr 1:25, Pr 8:33, Pr 13:18, Pr 15:32; abs. = refrain Ez Eze 24:14.— Ju Jdg 5:2 v.1. [[פֶּרַע]].

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. 3 ms. [[יִדָמפּ֫רַע עָָם]] Pr 29:18 the people is let loose, lacks restraint.
